items.sentence: I think we have enough time to finish doing that today.
I thought it might be fun to go to Boston this weekend.
I was surprised when I heard Tom had committed suicide.
The meeting didn\'t last as long as I thought it would.
Will you be sticking around Boston for a few more days?
You find out who your friends are when times are tough.
Tom eagerly ate the sandwich that the fireman gave him.
Tom forgot his key so he crawled in through the window.
Tom didn\'t tell anyone else where he\'d hid the money.
I took a bus so I wouldn\'t be late for my appointment.
